mapper.select: select u.id,u.username,u.nick_name from acl_user_role ur inner join acl_user u on u.id=ur.user_id inner join acl_role r on r.id=ur.role_id where r.role_code="REVIEW" and ur.is_deleted=0 and u.is_deleted=0 and r.is_deleted=0
select u.id,u.username,u.nick_name from t_user_manuscript um left join acl_user u on um.user_id= u.id where um.manuscript_id=#{manuscriptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
